product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a premium and feminine aesthetic designed to promote luxury earrings. The background is a diagonally split gradient, transitioning from deep plum tones in the top-left to soft blush pinks in the bottom-right, accentuated by subtle sparkle and star motifs for a glamorous touch. A bold sans-serif white uppercase text element labeled `heading_1` introduces the product emphasis, followed seamlessly by `heading_2`. The subheading (`subheading`) uses a soft pink serif typeface to suggest elegance. Below, the `description` lists product features in clean, white sans-serif. The price (`price`) stands out in bold white for emphasis. A soft pink call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with a plum-colored label text (`cta`) anchors the lower section. The product image (`product_image`) of the earrings is placed diagonally for style and balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: #2F243A
- Soft Blush Pink: #F8D1D1
- Rose Gold Pink: #F5B6B6
- Midnight Purple: #3C2747
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a delicate and feminine color palette. The primary color is a soft rose gold (#F4A6A6), which outlines the structural framework, including floral petal shapes and bead details. This metallic pink hue provides warmth and sophistication. Accents include brilliant white (#FFFFFF) and crystal-clear tones (#E6E6E6) from the embedded rhinestones, adding sparkle and contrast. The transitional blending of rose gold with the diamonds is seamless, creating a luxurious harmony. These tones highlight the earrings' intricate shape while emphasizing their premium aesthetic, making pastel pinks and soft whites ideal for the advertisement banner.
